biogs.title: First Circular - Note deadline for abstract is soon: December 15th
Location: Tradewinds Hotel, Fremantle, Western Australia, Apr 7-10 2025
biogs.information: On behalf of the Loop 3D Foundation and the Loop platform, we will organise a conference on 3D geological modelling to discuss current and future workflows, approaches and applications, and unsolved challenges of 3D geological modelling at all scales
biogs.sub_info:
The conference will run in person over Tue 8th and Wed 9th April.
A series of half-day workshops will be organised on Mon 7th and Thu 10th April

biogs.title: Scientific themes:
biogs.information:
• 3D geological modelling methods
• Integration with geophysical interpretation and modelling
• Applications to resources management (water, minerals, tailings)
• Applications to minerals exploration

biogs.title: Abstracts submission - Deadline: Dec 15, 2024
biogs.information:
We welcome abstracts from 3D practioners and method developers from industry, academia and government organisations related to 3D geological modelling in general and highlighting current practices, applications and challenges
Please also submit abstract for the workshop on Thursday 10 April
biogs.sub_info:
Presenters must attend the conference in person and be registered. There is no abstract submission fee
Please use this abstract template and submit your abstract here as a PDF before Dec 15, 2024

biogs.title: Program
biogs.sub_info:
Mon 7 April: Workshop 1 - How to use Loop; hands on map2loop and LoopStructural libraries, presented by Lachlan Grose, Rabii Chaarani (& Laurent Ailleres)
Mon 7 April, from 6pm (tbc): Ice Breaker - Contact us to sponsor this networking event
Tue 8 April: Technical Conference
Tue 8 April, from 4pm (tbc) - Poster session & happy hours
Wed 9 April: Technical Conference
Thu 10 April: Machine learning and 3D modelling; Integrated geophysics and geological modelling, presented by Mark Jessell, Mark Lindsay, Helen McFarlane, Jeremie Giraud, Vitaly Ogarko

biogs.title: Student Registration
biogs.information: Student ONLY Registration information - securely powered by stripe

biogs.title: Registration
biogs.information: Registration information - securely powered by stripe
biogs.sub_info:
Registration costs are capped at AUD$1200 maximum
Registration to the workshops requires registration to the conference and will be confirmed on a first-in first-served basis (only 40 attendees per workshop)
Early birds rates until Dec 15, 2024
Cancellation policy

biogs.title: Accommodation
biogs.information: We are pleased to inform you that delegates can enjoy a special rate at the Tradewinds Hotel using the promo code: LOOP2025
biogs.sub_info: Please enter this code when booking online at Tradewinds Hotel
